answers.answer: Im 30 weeks and have it. Yes you will test four times a day, but as long as you follow the instructions and the diet they put in place for you, you anf your baby should be just fine :)

question: dr just told me i tested at 198??? i have to go see a new dr now...so i can test four times a day..how serious is this? im nervous..35 weeks preggo
title: gestational diabetes?!
